awd_titl_txt: POWRE:  Study of Model Equations for Water Waves
awd_abstract_narration: This work is funded through the Professional Opportunities for  Women in Research and Education (POWRE) program as a  Visiting Professorship activity.    The investigator will study various model equations for  water waves. Based on the investigation  of the  Boussinesq systems which describe bi-directional waves  in a nonlinear dispersive media, the investigator will  study theoretically and numerically the  generalized systems  which include one or more of the following factors    a) the external forcing which come from the bottom     topography and the surface pressure.  b) more accurate (higher-order) systems;  c) weakly two-dimensional uni-directional waves (KP-equations);     with or without external forcing.  d) weakly two-dimensional bi-directional waves, with or without     external forcing.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
